entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 05:36 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
